description: Overview of treatment options for Anxiety.

subclasses.name: Panic Disorder
subclasses.description: Detailed information about Panic Disorder treatments for Anxiety.

drugs.name: Gabapentin
drugs.Notes: No significant superiority over placebo in overall population, but significant benefits in subgroup of more severly ill patients

drugs.name: Trazodone
drugs.Notes: At low doses, antagonizes 5-HT-2A, H1, and alpha-1 receptors; at higher doses antagonizes SERT (SRI) and 5HT2C

subclasses.name: Social Anxiety Disorder
subclasses.description: Detailed information about Social Anxiety Disorder treatments for Anxiety.

drugs.name: Atenolol
drugs.Notes: Beta-blockers have been used in clinical practice for performance situations such as public speaking.

drugs.name: Propranolol
drugs.Notes: Beta-blockers have been used in clinical practice for performance situations such as public speaking.

drugs.name: Trazodone
drugs.Notes: At low doses, antagonizes 5-HT-2A, H1, and alpha-1 receptors; at higher doses antagonizes SERT (SRI) and 5HT2C

subclasses.name: OCD
subclasses.description: Detailed information about OCD treatments for Anxiety.
